src:
Polda Jatim Kirim Labfor Guna Selidiki Penyebab Ambruknya Atap SD Gentong
06 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Anik Hasanah


Polda Jatim Kirim Labfor Guna Selidiki Penyebab Ambruknya Atap SD Gentong

KBRN, Surabaya : Kepolisian Daerah Jawa Timur (Polda Jatim) mengirimkan tim laboratorium forensik (labfor), untuk memeriksa ambruknya atap sekolah SD Gentong, Kota Pasuruan, yang menewaskan dua orang. Kabid Humas Polda Jatim, Kombes Pol Frans Barung Mangera menjelaskan, sementara dua orang meninggal dunia, yakni Irza Almira (8) dan guru Sevina Arsy Wijaya (19) yang saat itu berada di kelas V. "Nah Polda Jawa Timur sudah memanggil laboratorium forensik, kita sudah berangkat menuju ke Pasuruan Kota guna memeriksa konstruksi," ujarnya, Selasa (5/11/2019).Barung mengatakan, berdasarkan keterangan sementara, bangunan itu dikerjakan tahun 2017, tetapi atapnya hanya genteng yang dilapisi atap seng. Tetapi hasil pemeriksaan baru bisa diketahui setelah scintific identification."Tetapi nanti akan diputuskan setelah hasil yang namanya scientific identification kita bekerja berdasarkan laboratorium forensik," tegasnya. Berdasarkan data, korban SDN Gentong Kecamatan Gadingrejo, Kota Pasuruan, antara lain : 1. Zidan, umur  8 tahun alamat Gentong2. Wildalmul, umur 11 tahun alamat gentong3. Abdul Muktim, umur  11 tahun alamat Gentong4. Hilda Salsa, umur 11 tahun alamat Gentong5. Alisah, umur 7 tahun alamat Gentong6. Kina, umur 8 tahun alamat Wirogunan7. Irza Almira, umur 8 tahun alamat gentong (meninggal dunia)8. Akbar, umur 8 tahun alamat Gentong9. Siti Rohmania, umur 8 tahun alamat Gentong10. Aisyah, umur 8 tahun alamat Karya Bakti11. Ahmad Gerhana, umur 8 tahun alamat Gentong12. Zahra salsabilla, umur 9 tahun alamat GentongDan Sevina Arsy Wijaya, umur 19 tahun Pengajar, Alamat Kelurahan Mandaranrejo, Kecamatan Panggungrejo, Kota Pasuruan. Pada saat kejadian berada di kelas V.
text:
East Java Regional Police Send Labfor To Investigate the Causes of Roof Crash at Gentong Elementary School
Nov 6, 2019, 06:00 by Anik Hasanah


East Java Regional Police Send Labfor To Investigate the Causes of Roof Crash at Gentong Elementary School

KBRN, Surabaya: East Java Regional Police (Polda East Java) sent a team of forensic laboratories (labfor), to examine the collapse of the roof of the Gentong Elementary School, Pasuruan City, which killed two people. East Java Regional Police Head of Public Relations, Senior Commissioner Pol Frans Barung Mangera explained, while two people died, namely Irza Almira (8) and teacher Sevina Arsy Wijaya (19) who was then in class V. "Nah East Java Regional Police have called forensic laboratories, we have gone to Pasuruan City to check the construction, "he said, Tuesday (11/5/2019). Barung said, based on the interim information, the building was done in 2017, but the roof was only a roof that was coated with a zinc roof. But the results of the examination can only be known after scientific identification. "But later it will be decided after the results of the so-called scientific identification we work based on forensic laboratories," he said. Based on data, victims of SDN Gentong, Gadingrejo District, Pasuruan City, among others: 1. Zidan, aged 8 years, address Gentong2. Wildalmul, age 11 years old, gentong address3. Abdul Muktim, age 11, Gentong address4. Hilda Salsa, age 11, Gentong address5. Alisah, age 7 years Gentong address6. Kina, age 8 years Wirogunan address7. Irza Almira, age 8 years old, gentong address (died) 8. Akbar, age 8, Gentong address9. Siti Rohmania, age 8, Gentong10 address. Aisyah, age 8 years addresses Karya Bakti11. Ahmad Gerhana, age 8 years Gentong address12. Zahra salsabilla, 9 years old, address Gentong, and Sevina Arsy Wijaya, 19 years old Teacher, Address Mandaranrejo Sub-district, Panggungrejo District, Pasuruan City. At the time the incident was in class V.
